name: The Music of Enya Quiz / Test | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'From Bissan to Palan - in the shade of Avalon, from Fiji to Tiree and the Isles of Ebony, from Peru to Cebu hear the power of Babylon, from Bali to Cali - far beneath the Coral Sea, from the North to the South, Ebudae into Khartoum, from the deep sea of clouds to the island of the moon'. Which song are these lyrics from?
questions.explanation:
'Orinoco Flow'.

	'Orinoco Flow', also know as 'Sail Away', is from 'Watermark' (1988).

questions.text: TRUE or FALSE: Enya only sings her music in English.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Enya also sings her songs in Gaelic and Latin.

questions.text: Enya has released a Christmas single named 'Oiche Chiun'. What does 'Oiche Chiun' mean in English?
Which popular song was used in the movie, 'Far and Away', starring Tom Cruise and Nicole Kidman?
questions.explanation:
'Book of Days'.

	Most pressings from mid-1992 onwards replaced the original 'Book Of Days' with a re-recording of the English lyric version used in the film, which had previously been released as a single.

questions.text: Enya is one of the world's best-known female artists. By the end of the year 2001, how many albums had she sold worldwide?
questions.explanation:
More than 40 million.

	By the end of the year 2001, Enya had sold 44 million albums worldwide - which ranks alongside Cher, Tina Turner, Madonna, and Whitney Houston in total sales.

Ireland.

	Enya is Ireland's best-selling solo artist ever.

questions.text: Enya had some songs, including 'Watermark' and 'Storms In Africa II' in a movie staring Andie MacDowell. What is the movie?
questions.explanation:
'Green Card'.

	'Green Card' also stared the French actor Gerard Depardieu.

questions.text: Enya's first record 'Enya', was recorded in 1986 and released in 1987. However, the album was remastered and reissued as what?
YES or NO: In the twentieth century, did Enya win a Grammy?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Enya won a Grammy for 1995's 'The Memory Of Trees'.

questions.text: Enya has two songs on which 2001 soundtrack?
questions.correct: 'The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'
questions.explanation:
'The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'.

	The songs on the soundtrack are 'May It Be' and 'The Council of Elrond' ('Aniron').
